instructions: From any Home screen, tap Apps . Tap Emergency alerts . Tap the Menu key. Tap Settings . Tap to check or uncheck any of the following: Extreme alert Severe alert Amber alert
From any Home screen, tap the Application icon. Tap the desired mail application. Tap the Menu icon. Tap Settings . Tap Notifications settings . Select the desired notification type.
From any Home screen, tap the Applications icon. Tap Contacts . Tap the desired contact. Tap Ringtone . Select the desired ringtone. Tap APPLY .
From any Home screen, tap Apps . Tap People . Tap the desired contact. Tap Ringtone . Select the desired ringtone. Tap APPLY .
